sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using Buildora, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, you may not use our platform.

sections.title: 2. Description of Service
sections.content: Buildora provides a multi-tenant SaaS platform for merchants to create and manage online stores, specifically optimized for the Egyptian market.

sections.title: 3. Merchant Responsibilities
sections.content: As a merchant, you are responsible for: providing accurate information during registration, maintaining the security of your account, complying with local laws and regulations, and verifying customer payments accurately.

sections.title: 4. Payments and Fees
sections.content: Subscription fees are billed monthly or annually. Buildora may also charge transaction fees per order as specified in your plan details.

sections.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Buildora is not liable for any disputes between merchants and their customers. We provide the tools, but the business transaction is between the merchant and the end-buyer.
